### Giant, Fire

_Bulky, muscled giants with coppery skin and red hair. Heavily armored in iron plate mail studded with bronze rivets._

**LV** 9, **AL** C
**AC** 15 (plate mail), **HP** 44, **MV** double near
**ATK** 3 greatsword +9 (2d12)

|  S  |  D  |  C  |  I  |  W  |  Ch  |
|:---:|:---:|:---:|:---:|:---:|:----:|
| 6 | 0 | 4 | 1 | 2 | 1 |

**Fireblood:** Fire immune.
